item.title: Zootopia
item.description: my goal is to watch a new movie every week, and the film i chose was Zootopia 2. i will talk more about my choice in it’s actual page but yeah :) in order to get ready for it (i’m gonna see it at 10pm, i think the movie might either end a couple mins before midnight or slighlty after technicly failing my goal but like, is anyone even reading these? i hope so / eventauly ppl will. Im hoping a few specific people i have in mind atleast read them occasionly… I do rant alot i feel but like idk, i want to be unabridged)
